# stripe_billing_meter (Data Source)

Use this data source to retrieve information about an existing Stripe Billing Meter.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `event_name` (String) Event name for the meter
- `id` (String) Unique identifier for the object

### Read-Only

- `display_name` (String) Display name of the meter
- `status` (String) Status of the meter
